attributes.action: Reclassify cannabis as a dangerous drug and clearly criminal to use or sell.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Upgrade the classification of cannabis to a well defined crime as it is a dangerous drug on the strong evidence of its relationship to mental health breakdown, physical health breakdown,effect on drivers' judgement and addiction to itself and or other drugs. It is now a far stronger drug than before. Especially to protect the young it should be well upgraded.
